SummaryEnglish: Fore! After Eve’s first meet-up with Aoi on the grass left her in defeat, she’s had her eyes set on a rematch to return the favor. Both these up-and-coming golfers are highly skilled, highly unique and most of all, highly competitive. With dreams of making it pro, a rivalry is getting in full swing as they both battle it out in the biggest tournaments.

1.SummaryEnglish: Eve is an underground golfer who supports poor street orphans with the money she makes from illegal golfing matches. But her life is about to change forever when she meets a young golfer who's just arrived from Japan...

2.SummaryEnglish: Eve battles the "Innocent Tyrant" Aoi on one of the course's toughest holes: a monstrous L-shaped par 5 with a thick forest surrounding the course. Can the "Rainbow Bullet" win out against this strange challenger from a faraway land?

3.TitleEnglish: A Match Between Just the Two of Us
3.SummaryEnglish: Eve wants to play Aoi badly, and she's willing to do whatever it takes. She pulls some strings to get invited to the last day of the world junior championship, and begins her game...

4.SummaryEnglish: After pulling strings to get into the championship, Eve owes the mob a favor. She'll have to duel it out on a huge, randomly generated golf course. Can she win and make it back to challenge Aoi before she leaves?

5.SummaryEnglish: After she fails to catch up with Aoi, Eve thinks she's lost her chance to play together forever. But then she hears about VR golf...

6.SummaryEnglish: When the mafia tries to bulldoze Eve's home to build a new casino, she's forced into a deadly game of golf to earn the money for a new home.

7.SummaryEnglish: Eve faces her former boss, Rose, in a climactic battle inside a huge underground hall where golf courses are randomly generated by thousands of tons of machinery.

8.SummaryEnglish: Eve's battle with Rose reaches its conclusion. The winner wins enough prize money to be set for life, and the loser will be killed by the mob!

9.TitleEnglish: Ichina Saotome Wants to Be a Pro Caddy!
9.SummaryEnglish: Now in Japan, Eve is forced to make her way alone, far from the world she's known. But before she can even settle in, she's already found herself challenged to a tough match of golf!

10.SummaryEnglish: As she settles into her new life in Japan, Eve finds herself faced with unfamiliar surroundings and new people. As she sets out for a night on the town, she finds herself caught up in a tense game of... mini-golf?

11.TitleEnglish: No Matter How Tall a Weed Grows, It Will Never Reach the Sun
11.SummaryEnglish: After finally making it to Japan, Eve is all ready to play Aoi at last. But before she can, Aoi is spirited away to play a match in another prefecture. And then Eve gets caught up in an unexpected match of her own...

12.TitleEnglish: Are Aoi and Eve Okay Together? The Doubles Championship Begins
12.SummaryEnglish: It's the day of the prefectural qualifiers, and Eve and Aoi are a shoo-in to win. That is, if they can keep their arguments from ruining the match!

13.TitleEnglish: I Think Who Gets What Room Is Very Important for Girls
13.SummaryEnglish: The Doubles Championship heats up as Eve and Aoi face off against the best high-school players in Japan. Can they take their first step towards worldwide fame and glory?

1.TitleEnglish: A Certain Truth Sleeping in the Girl's Memories
1.SummaryEnglish: Eve and Aoi make it to the semifinals, where they face Kaoruko Iijima and her powerful "In the Zone."

2.TitleEnglish: The Reason Just Playing Golf Makes Me So Happy
2.SummaryEnglish: Eve and Aoi enter the tournament finals and get a chance to face Himekawa.

3.TitleEnglish: The Strange Fates of Two Generations of Young People Who Were Caught Up in the Ego of Adults
3.SummaryEnglish: Eve and Aoi clash over their shared past as the Doubles championship reaches its end.

4.TitleEnglish: The Girl Who Regained Her Lost Memories Returns Home and Learns a New Truth
4.SummaryEnglish: Eve returns to Nafrece and learns more about her parents and her past.

5.SummaryEnglish: Eve participates in one last underworld golf match to free herself from the world of mafia golf forever.

6.SummaryEnglish: As Eve settles into life in Europe, Aoi gets a new weapon that will lead her to victory.

7.TitleEnglish: The Rainbow That Tells of Victory
7.SummaryEnglish: Aoi faces her toughest challenge yet against top-ranked pro golfer Reika Shikishima.

8.SummaryEnglish: As Eve battles Leo's chosen golfer, she unlocks a new power that will guide her to victory.

9.SummaryEnglish: Eve creates her final ultimate weapon on the path to becoming a pro.

10.SummaryEnglish: Aoi and Eve both get ready for one last match.

11.SummaryEnglish: Aoi and Eve face off against the Lunar Empress, one of the world's top golfers.

12.SummaryEnglish: With Aoi too sick to play, Eve fights alone against the Lunar Empress. Will the two of them ever keep their promise?
